backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with storage mixin, user profiles, lobbies, tournaments, gameplay state types, transactions, admin stats, and various game-related data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend hooks and components across the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the root div and main TypeScript entrypoint for the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling tabs, game modes, wallet integration, admin checks, quick play flow, and layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin dashboard UI for viewing platform stats and updating the house cut percentage with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: UI badge showing backend connection status with retry feedback and detailed tooltip messages.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal handling deposit and withdrawal flows with Flexa support, wallet interactions, and status polling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Help card explaining how to publish an app live on the Internet Computer and where to find public links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing game mode toggle, wallet connection controls, and deposit/withdraw modals.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays build metadata along with current site origin and public ICP link, with copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: UI for browsing lobbies and starting quick-play games, with a notice about upcoming multiplayer features.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder lobby room card indicating multiplayer lobby rooms are under development.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or saving user profiles in real or fun mode, integrating wallet and local storage.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Displays a placeholder interface for Spades or Omaha quick-play mode with exit controls and a coming-soon alert.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Renders a tournaments preview card showing upcoming tournament features with mode-specific badges and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Provides a modal for WalletConnect linking, including QR flow on desktop and deep links for mobile wallets with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Shows a modal prompting users to install a browser wallet, offering links to Coinbase Wallet and MetaMask.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Displays wallet balances, stats, and transaction history for real or offline modes and manages deposit/withdraw modals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with connection status, retry tracking, and user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend canister actors and fetching or mutating user, lobby, tournament, and admin data.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Implements a Web3 wallet hook supporting injected wallets or guest sessions, handling connection, balance fetching, chain checks, and transaction readiness.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom themes, animations, scrollbar styles, and interactive element enhancements.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Contains placeholder Web3Modal configuration and metadata for Base chain and app branding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Utility functions for determining canister IDs, generating public IC URLs, and copying text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a crypto card-game dApp with React/Tailwind frontend, IC canister backend, payment integrations, architectural notes, and known implementation gaps.
